KSP Suggestion Read below

I think we should have like a Kerbal city, and also, add more life to the planet. I know this is hard, but just at least copy & paste tree's so it looks like a forest when we're crashing into Kerbin, you know? And where are the animals? It feel's lifeless, the mountains are just plain boring and all there the only difference is color! What I want is the ability to fly over kerbin and see actual kerbin life, not just plains and plains of grass and then a magical desert where there are a few cactus. Where is the nature? There are a few tree's, there are a few bushes, and there are a few cactus. Animals? None to be seen

And I do know that there are mods out there, but it'd be nice to have them implemented!

Now, I know that this will be hard because of some problems such as having too many units on such an enourmos scale (sorry if I pronounced that wrong), but honestly we have to add some life, some Kerbals walking around the KSP, or a village a few miles away into the north and things like that. It'd be nice. Maybe some day in the future you could implement that. It's just to add realism, some player may want this and other not. It'd be nice to have this implemented into the game. And if it is someday implemented into the game, there should be an option for that.

Thanks for reading!
